mapper.sql: DELIVERY_STOCK_ID AS deliveryStockId, PD_CODE AS pdCode, NORMS_CODE AS normsCode, APPLY_DELIVERY_NUM AS applyDeliveryNum, CONFIRM_DELIVERY_NUM AS confirmDeliveryNum, PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM AS planDeliveryNum, ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM AS actualDeliveryNum, MEMO AS memo
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_delivery_stock_detail (
DELIVERY_STOCK_ID,
PD_CODE,
NORMS_CODE,
APPLY_DELIVERY_NUM,
CONFIRM_DELIVERY_NUM,
PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM,
ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM,
ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME ) VALUES (
#{deliveryStockId},
#{pdCode},
#{normsCode},
#{applyDeliveryNum},
#{confirmDeliveryNum},
#{planDeliveryNum},
#{actualDeliveryNum},
0, #{delFlg}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime} )
mapper.update: update ds_delivery_stock_detail set APPLY_DELIVERY_NUM=#{applyDeliveryNum}, CONFIRM_DELIVERY_NUM=#{confirmDeliveryNum}, PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM=#{planDeliveryNum}, ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM=#{actualDeliveryNum}, MEMO=#{memo} WHERE DELIVERY_STOCK_ID=#{deliveryStockId} AND PD_CODE=#{pdCode} AND NORMS_CODE=#{normsCode}
mapper.select: select actual.PD_CODE as productCode, actual.OUT_SPEC as productSpecifical, actual.OUT_NW as netWeight, actual.NORMS_CODE as packageCode, actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM as sendNum, actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM as sendActualNum, actual.OUT_NW*actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM as sendQty, actual.INPUT_DATE as inputDate from ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual as actual where actual.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} and actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = #{filterMap.pdStockType} and actual.HALF_CODE = #{halfCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 ORDER BY actual.PD_CODE

select actual.PD_CODE as productCode, actual.OUT_SPEC as productSpecifical, actual.OUT_NW as netWeight, actual.NORMS_CODE as packageCode, /*sum(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) as sendNum, sum(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) as sendActualNum, actual.OUT_NW*sum(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) as sendQty*/ IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM)/actual.OUT_NW,2), 0) AS sendNum, IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM)/actual.OUT_NW,2), 0) AS sendActualNum, IFNULL(SUM(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM), 0) AS sendQty, IFNULL(SUM(actual.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM), 0) AS sendPlanQty FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual as actual WHERE actual.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = 2 AND actual.HALF_CODE = #{halfCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY actual.PD_CODE, actual.OUT_SPEC, actual.OUT_NW, actual.NORMS_CODE ORDER BY actual.PD_CODE

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t1.netWeight),'') AS currentNetWeight, IFNULL(SUM(t1.sendNum),'') AS currentSendNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.sendActualNum),'') AS currentSendActualNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.receiveNum),'') AS currentReceiveNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.sendPlanQty),'') AS currentSendPlanQty, IFNULL(SUM(t1.sendQty),'') AS currentSendQty, IFNULL(SUM(t1.recriveQty),'') AS currentRecriveQty, IFNULL(SUM(t1.differNum),'') AS currentDifferNum, IFNULL(SUM(t1.differQty),'') AS currentDifferQty from ( SELECT DISTINCT actual.PD_CODE AS productCode, actual.OUT_SPEC AS productSpecifical, actual.OUT_NW AS netWeight, actual.NORMS_CODE AS packageCode, IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM , 0) AS receiveNum, IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendNum, IFNULL( stockDetail.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM, 0 ) AS sendActualNum, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL( stockDetail.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM, 0 ) AS sendQty, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendPlanQty, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) AS recriveQty, IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) - IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS differNum, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * (IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) - IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) ) AS differQty FROM ds_delivery_stock_detail AS stockDetail LEFT JOIN ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual AS actual on stockDetail.PD_CODE = actual.PD_CODE WHERE stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID = #{filterMap.deliveryStockId} AND actual.DIST_MONTH = #{distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 AND actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = 2 AND actual.HALF_CODE = #{halfCode} ) as t1

SELECT actual.PD_CODE AS productCode, actual.OUT_SPEC AS productSpecifical, actual.OUT_NW AS netWeight, actual.NORMS_CODE AS packageCode, IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM , 0) AS receiveNum, IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendNum, IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendActualNum, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendQty, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS sendPlanQty, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) AS recriveQty, IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) - IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) AS differNum, IFNULL(actual.OUT_NW, 0) * (IFNULL(stockDetail.ACTUAL_RECEIVE_NUM, 0) - IFNULL(stockDetail.PLAN_DELIVERY_NUM, 0) ) AS differQty FROM ds_delivery_stock_detail AS stockDetail LEFT JOIN ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual AS actual on stockDetail.PD_CODE = actual.PD_CODE WHERE stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID = #{filterMap.deliveryStockId} AND actual.DIST_MONTH = #{distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 AND actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = 2 AND actual.HALF_CODE = #{halfCode} AND stockDetail.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID, actual.PD_CODE, actual.OUT_SPEC, actual.OUT_NW, actual.NORMS_CODE ORDER BY stockDetail.DELIVERY_STOCK_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_delivery_stock (
DELIVERY_STOCK_ID,
DIST_MONTH,
LGCS_CODE,
SUPP_CODE,
HALF_CODE,
DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS,
DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR,
DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME,
DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL,
DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME,
DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME,
TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL,
DELIVERY_MEMO,
STOCK_MEMO,
DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ,
STOCK_ADDR,
STOCK_RESPON_NAME,
STOCK_RESPON_TEL,
STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME,
STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL,
DELIVERY_RECEIVE_STOCK_TIME,
DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME ) VALUES (
#{deliveryStockId},
#{distMonth},
#{lgcsCode},
#{suppCode},
#{halfCode},
#{deliveryStockStatus},
#{deliveryWarehouseAddr},
#{deliveryResponName},
#{deliveryResponTel},
#{deliveryExecuteName},
#{deliveryExecuteTel},
#{transportUnitName},
#{transportUnitResponName},
#{transportUnitResponTel},
#{transportUnitExecuteName},
#{transportUnitExecuteTel},
#{deliveryMemo},
#{stockMemo},
#{deliveryStockTimeReq},
#{stockAddr},
#{stockResponName},
#{stockResponTel},
#{stockExecuteName},
#{stockExecuteTel},
#{deliveryReceiveStockTime},
#{delFlg}, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime} )
mapper.update: update ds_delivery_stock set DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth}, LGCS_CODE=#{lgcsCode}, SUPP_CODE=#{suppCode}, HALF_CODE=#{halfCode}, DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS=#{deliveryStockStatus}, DELIVERY_RECEIVE_STOCK_TIME=#{deliveryReceiveStockTime}, DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR=#{deliveryWarehouseAddr}, DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME=#{deliveryResponName}, DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL=#{deliveryResponTel}, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME=#{deliveryExecuteName}, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL=#{deliveryExecuteTel}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME=#{transportUnitName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME=#{transportUnitResponName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL=#{transportUnitResponTel}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME=#{transportUnitExecuteName}, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL=#{transportUnitExecuteTel}, DELIVERY_MEMO=#{deliveryMemo}, STOCK_MEMO=#{stockMemo}, DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ=#{deliveryStockTimeReq}, STOCK_ADDR=#{stockAddr}, STOCK_RESPON_NAME=#{stockResponName}, STOCK_RESPON_TEL=#{stockResponTel}, STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME=#{stockExecuteName}, STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL=#{stockExecuteTel}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime} WHERE DELIVERY_STOCK_ID=#{deliveryStockId}
mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_STOCK_ID AS deliveryStockId, DIST_MONTH AS distMonth, LGCS_CODE AS lgcsCode, SUPP_CODE AS suppCode, HALF_CODE AS halfCode, DELIVERY_STOCK_STATUS AS deliveryStockStatus, DELIVERY_WAREHOUSE_ADDR AS deliveryWarehouseAddr, DELIVERY_RESPON_NAME AS deliveryResponName, DELIVERY_RESPON_TEL AS deliveryResponTel, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_NAME AS deliveryExecuteName, DELIVERY_EXECUTE_TEL AS deliveryExecuteTel, TRANSPORT_UNIT_NAME AS transportUnitName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_NAME AS transportUnitResponName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_RESPON_TEL AS transportUnitResponTel, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_NAME AS transportUnitExecuteName, TRANSPORT_UNIT_EXECUTE_TEL AS transportUnitExecuteTel, DELIVERY_MEMO AS deliveryMemo, STOCK_MEMO AS stockMemo, DELIVERY_STOCK_TIME_REQ AS deliveryStockTimeReq, STOCK_ADDR AS stockAddr, STOCK_RESPON_NAME AS stockResponName, STOCK_RESPON_TEL AS stockResponTel, STOCK_EXECUTE_NAME AS stockExecuteName, STOCK_EXECUTE_TEL AS stockExecuteTel, DEL_FLG AS delFlg, CRT_ID AS crtId, CRT_TIME AS crtTime, UPD_ID AS updId, UPD_TIME AS updTime FROM ds_delivery_stock WHERE DELIVERY_STOCK_ID = #{filterMap.deliveryStockId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual ( SUPP_DS_ID, VIRTUAL_STOCK_ACTUAL_ID, DIST_MONTH, LGCS_CODE, SUPP_CODE, PD_STOCK_TYPE, HALF_CODE, CLASSES_CODE, BREED_CODE, FEATURE_CODE, GRADE_CODE, OUT_SPEC, OUT_NW, MACHINING_CODE, PD_CODE, NORMS_CODE, INPUT_DATE, OLD_ACTUAL_NUM, NEW_ACTUAL_NUM, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER) SELECT actual.SUPP_DS_ID,#{filterMap.virtualStockActualId},actual.DIST_MONTH,actual.LGCS_CODE,actual.SUPP_CODE, #{filterMap.pdStockTypeTo},actual.HALF_CODE ,actual.CLASSES_CODE,actual.BREED_CODE,actual.FEATURE_CODE,actual.GRADE_CODE,actual.OUT_SPEC,actual.OUT_NW,substring(actual.PD_CODE,3,1),actual.PD_CODE,actual.NORMS_CODE ,#{filterMap.inputDate},0,#{filterMap.newActualNum},0,#{crtId},#{crtTime},#{crtId},#{crtTime} ,NULL,NULL,1 FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual AS actual WHERE actual.DIST_MONTH=#{filterMap.distMonth} AND actual.LGCS_CODE=#{filterMap.areaCode} AND actual.SUPP_CODE=#{filterMap.supplierCode} AND actual.PD_STOCK_TYPE = #{filterMap.pdStockTypeFm} AND actual.HALF_CODE = #{filterMap.halfCode} AND actual.PD_CODE = #{filterMap.pdCode} AND actual.DEL_FLG = 0 LIMIT 0,1;
